# EcoSpray Solutions — AI-Friendly Content Index
# https://ecospraysolutions.com

## About
EcoSpray Solutions is Pittsburgh's trusted spray foam insulation company based in Murrysville, PA. We provide professional residential, commercial, and new construction insulation services across Western Pennsylvania. Our spray foam insulation helps homeowners save up to 50% on energy bills while improving comfort, air quality, and property value.

## Services
- Residential Spray Foam Insulation (attics, walls, basements, crawl spaces)
- Commercial Insulation (offices, warehouses, retail, industrial)
- New Construction Insulation (builder programs, code compliance)
- Energy Audits (thermal imaging, blower door tests, ROI analysis)

## Service Area
Pittsburgh, Murrysville, Monroeville, Export, Greensburg, Irwin, North Huntingdon, Delmont, Latrobe, Jeannette, Penn Township, Plum, Penn Hills, Trafford, Harrison City — and all of Western Pennsylvania.
